title: 给出模组config，悬赏代为修改
author: StBruce
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Twilight_Two 于 2020-4-28 20:18 编辑 

之前乱改导致创建世界失败，有没有人可以代为修改

模组是搬运至本站的https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-998968-1-1.html，RWBYM
意思就是我不想让地图自然生成该模组的怪物，矿物，建筑什么的，我改数字改崩了。。



# Configuration file
general {
    ##########################################################################################################
    # general
    #--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
    # General Config Options
    ##########################################################################################################
    general {
        B:"Give Player Scroll on First Spawn?"=false
    }
    ##########################################################################################################
    # mobs - spawnrate
    #--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
    # Spawnrates for Mobs.
    ##########################################################################################################
    "mobs - spawnrate" {
        # Enable Lancer Queens to Spawn anywhere dark
        B:"Lancer Queen Nests"=false
        I:"Spawn Rate Apathy"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Beowolf"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Boarbatusk"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Creep"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Deathstalker"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Geist"=30
        I:"Spawn Rate Giant Nevermore"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Goliath"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Lancer"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Mutant Deathstalker"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Nevermore"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Nuckleeve"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Queen Lancer"=1
        I:"Spawn Rate Tiny DeathStalker"=50
        I:"Spawn Rate Ursa"=50
    }
    ##########################################################################################################
    # mobs - attributes
    #--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
    # Set Mon Attribute Multipliers.
    ##########################################################################################################
    "mobs - attributes" {
        D:"Global Aggro Range in Blocks"=60.0
        D:"Grimm Attack Damage Multiplier"=1.0
        # One in x chance to spawn a grimm every tick for each block.
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 2147483647
        I:"Grimm Fluid Spawn Rate"=50000
        D:"Grimm Health Multiplier"=1.0
    }
    ##########################################################################################################
    # player - aura/semblance settings
    #--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
    # Tweak Aura or Semblance Settings
    ##########################################################################################################
    "player - aura/semblance settings" {
        D:"Blake Drain Rate"=5.0
        B:"Can Aura Block Damage?"=true
        # enable or disable player damage to aura reduction
        B:"Enable Player Aura Damage Reduction"=true
        D:"Harriet Drain Rate"=0.05000000074505806
        I:"Harriet Speed Multiplier"=5
        D:"Jaune Aura Transfer Rate"=0.15000000596046448
        D:"Lysette Drain Rate"=0.05000000074505806
        D:"Nora Drain Rate"=0.5
        # Current Max Aura/player damage to aura reduction = player damage reduction reconmendation to keep at default
        I:"Player Aura Damage Reduction Amount"=1000
        I:"Position X"=175
        I:"Position Y"=39
        B:"Ragora Familiar Particles"=true
        D:"Ragora ShadowBall Resolution"=1.0
        D:"Ragora ShadowBall Size"=4.5
        I:"Ragora Summon Particle Count"=100
        D:"Ren Drain Rate"=0.30000001192092896
        B:"Render Aura Bar?"=true
        D:"Ruby Drain Rate"=0.10000000149011612
        I:"Semblance Recharge Delay in Ticks"=250
        I:"Weiss Armagigas Cost"=60
        I:"Weiss Beowolf Cost"=15
        I:"Weiss Boarbatusk Cost"=5
        I:"Weiss Ursa Cost"=25
        D:"Yang Drain Rate"=0.30000001192092896
    }
    ##########################################################################################################
    # worldgen/mining settings
    #--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
    # Tweak Structure and Ore Spawnchances
    ##########################################################################################################
    "worldgen/mining settings" {
        I:"Dust Ore Random Effect Chance"=20
        I:"Rarity of RWBYM Biomes"=20
        I:"Spawn Chance Crow Bar"=60
        I:"Spawn Chance Dark Crystal"=20
        I:"Spawn Chance Dust Shop"=60
        I:"Spawn Chance Fire Dust"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance Gravity DusT"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance Ice Dust"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance Impure Dust"=2
        I:"Spawn Chance Lightning Dust"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance Water Dust"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance Well"=10
        I:"Spawn Chance Wind Dust"=1
        I:"Spawn Chance of Remote Dust shop"=60
        B:"Unsafe Dust Mining"=true
    }
}

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
目前个人测试为把"worldgen/mining settings"下"Dust Ore Random Effect Chance"之外的全打成0，"Dust Ore Random Effect Chance"改成-1时没有发现矿物生成。

具体检查方法是/fill一坨TNT然后炸地表强制检查（熊）





批注 2020-04-28 210412.png (38.51 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-28 21:07 上传






顺带发现了一个很奇特的东西，毕竟这个Mod没怎么玩过，矿石接通红石信号之后直接消失了。。
